page.title: 11A VISIT FROM THE MAYOR con.
page.content: We asked when the first school was built.The old grammar school was the John Hanson Grammar School.Mr Porter went to East Street school and he had a school cap which was yellow and black stripes.He went to school at 9.00am till 4.00 pm, he liked school. When he was mayor he raised an appeal for India so they could make pumps which pump out water. We asked him about disasters in Andover.The worst was when the whole of New St. burnt down because the buildings had thatched roofs and it all went up in flames.
